global-fap.description: Edition of 100. Designed by Current Art Studios in Amsterdam. An air of the familiar, yet the excitement of the unknown is definitive of our illustrations. Nostalgic of a moment or an experience you’ve never had, a person you never knew or a song you never heard. The aim is for artworks to take you somewhere for the first time, again. Printed on museum quality fine art paper.
